Title: The Mermaid
Writer: Hing-Ka Chan, Stephen Chow, Chi Keung Fung, Miu-Kei Ho, Ivy Kong, Si-Cheun Lee, Zhengyu Lu, Kan-Cheung Tsang
Actors: Chao Deng, Show Lo, Yuqi Zhang, Yun Lin
Plot: Xuan's estate project involving reclamation of the sea threatens the livelihood of the mermaids who rely on the sea to survive. Shan is dispatched to stop Xuan and this leads them into falling for each other. Out of his love for Shan, Xuan plans to stop the reclamation. Unfortunately, Shan and the other mermaids are hunted by a hidden organisation and Xuan has to save Shan before it's too late...

Title: Crazy Rich Asians
Writer: Peter Chiarelli (screenplay by), Adele Lim (screenplay by), Kevin Kwan (based on the novel "Crazy Rich Asians" by)
Actors: Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Michelle Yeoh, Gemma Chan
Plot: This contemporary romantic comedy, based on a global bestseller, follows native New Yorker Rachel Chu to Singapore to meet her boyfriend's family.
